name: Pickable
description: Pickables are special Actors which can be grabbed, held and used by Characters.

functions.name: AddSkeletalMeshAttached
functions.description: Attaches a Skeletal Mesh as master pose to this entity
functions.description_long: Spawns and attaches a SkeletalMesh to this entity, the SkeletalMesh must have the same skeleton used by this Actor's mesh, and will follow all animations from it. Uses a custom ID to be used for removing/customizing it afterwards

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Used further for removing or applying material settings on it

parameters.name: skeletal_mesh_path
parameters.description: Path to SkeletalMesh asset to attach

parameters.name: use_parent_bounds
parameters.description: If true, this component uses its parents bounds when attached. This can be a significant optimization with many components attached together

parameters.name: use_base_leader_pose_component
parameters.description: If true, this component will use the base leader pose component for copying it's animation

parameters.name: attachable_id
parameters.description: Optionally attaches this to another attached skeletal mesh (instead of attaching to the root component)

functions.name: AddStaticMeshAttached
functions.description: Attaches a Static Mesh to this entity
functions.description_long: Spawns and attaches a StaticMesh to this Pickable in a Socket with a relative location and rotation. Uses a custom ID to be used for removing/customizing it afterwards

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID to assign to the StaticMesh

parameters.name: static_mesh_path
parameters.description: Path to StaticMesh asset to attach

parameters.name: socket
parameters.description: Bone socket to attach to

parameters.name: relative_location
parameters.description: Relative location

parameters.name: relative_rotation
parameters.description: Relative rotation

parameters.name: use_parent_bounds
parameters.description: If true, this component uses its parents bounds when attached. This can be a significant optimization with many components attached together

parameters.name: attachable_id
parameters.description: Optionally attaches this to another attached static mesh (instead of attaching to the root component)

functions.name: GetAllStaticMeshAttached
functions.description: Gets all Static Meshes attached to this entity

return.description: the key as the Attached ID, and the value as the Asset Path

functions.name: GetAllSkeletalMeshAttached
functions.description: Gets all Skeletal Meshes attached to this entity

return.description: the key as the Attached ID, and the value as the Asset Path

functions.name: RemoveSkeletalMeshAttached
functions.description: Removes, if it exists, a SkeletalMesh from this Pickable given its custom ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the SkeletalMesh to remove

functions.name: SetStaticMeshAttachedTransform
functions.description: Sets a Static Mesh Attached location and rotation

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the StaticMesh set with AddStaticMeshAttached

parameters.name: relative_location
parameters.description: New relative location

parameters.name: relative_rotation
parameters.description: New relative rotation

functions.name: RemoveStaticMeshAttached
functions.description: Removes, if it exists, a StaticMesh from this Pickable given its custom ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique ID of the StaticMesh to remove

functions.name: PullUse
functions.description: Pulls the usage of this Pickable (will start firing if this is a weapon)

parameters.name: release_use_after
parameters.description: Time in seconds to automatically release the usage (-1 will not release, 0 will release one tick after)

functions.name: ReleaseUse
functions.description: Releases the usage of this Pickable (will stop firing if this is a weapon)

functions.name: SetAttachmentSettings
functions.description: Sets the Attachment Settings for this Pickable (how it attaches to the Character when Picking up)

parameters.name: relative_location
parameters.description: Location relative to the Socket

parameters.name: relative_rotation
parameters.description: Rotation relative to the Socket

parameters.name: socket
parameters.description: Character Socket to attach to when picked up

functions.name: SetCrosshairMaterial
functions.description: Sets the crosshair material for this Pickable

parameters.name: material_asset
parameters.description: Asset path to the crosshair material

functions.name: SetPickable
functions.description: Sets if this Pickable can be picked up from ground by the player

functions.name: SetCanUse
functions.description: Sets if this Pickable can be used by the player when held

functions.name: GetMesh
functions.description: Gets the name of the asset this Pickable uses

functions.name: GetHandler
functions.description: Gets the Character, if it exists, that's holding this Pickable

functions.name: GetHandlingMode
functions.description: Gets the Handling Mode of this Pickable

events.name: Drop
events.description: When a Character drops this Pickable

arguments.name: self
arguments.description: The Pickable which has been dropped

arguments.name: was_triggered_by_player
arguments.description: If the Player actively pressed the Drop binding to drop

arguments.name: impact_force
arguments.description: The intensity of the hit normalized by the Pickable's weight

arguments.name: normal_impulse
arguments.description: The impulse direction of the hit

arguments.name: impact_location
arguments.description: The world space location of the impact

arguments.name: velocity
arguments.description: The Pickable's velocity at the moment it hit

events.name: Interact
events.description: Triggered when a Character interacts with this Pickable (i.e. tries to pick it up)

arguments.name: self
arguments.description: The Pickable that just got interacted with

arguments.name: character
arguments.description: The Character that interacted with it

events.name: PickUp
events.description: Triggered When a Character picks this up

arguments.name: self
arguments.description: The Pickable that just got picked up

arguments.name: character
arguments.description: The Character that picked it up

events.name: PullUse
events.description: Triggered when a Character presses the use button for this Pickable (i.e. clicks left mouse button with this equipped)

arguments.name: self
arguments.description: The Pickable which has just been used

events.name: ReleaseUse
events.description: Triggered when a Character releases the use button for this Pickable (i.e. releases left mouse button with this equipped)

arguments.name: self
arguments.description: The Pickable which has just stopped being used

arguments.name: character
arguments.description: The Character that stopped using it
